TopicTitle: Hello, and glad to be here!

Articles.Content:
I had tried the KSP demo, but never got very far with it. Nevertheless, I went ahead and bought 1.0 when it came out and am I glad I did! This game is a brain and time-eater like I haven't played since Buzz Aldrin's Race Into Space in my late '20s (and THAT should give you a clue as to how old I am). Thanks, Squad, for letting me have my space program fantasies again.

BWW
Welcome aboard! It is definitely one of the best time-eating video games ever.
Hey, how's it going, BrianWW? Glad to have you here!
Welcome to your new time sink! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Thanks everybody. I must admit, I have to play it in windowed mode, otherwise in full screen I can lose a full day. Of course, I also jumped straight into career mode, which is not necessarily the easiest way to get started either....
